pullRequest.title: Header & Sidebar prep for dark mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Update Header and Sidebar colors to prepare for light/dark theme
Have pinned Sidebar meld into UI
Motivation and Context


Theme All The Things
Screenshots (if appropriate):




Types of changes


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:



 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

nodes.bodyText: Did you change the direction of the arrow because of the sidebar text shadow or maybe the new pinned style? I prefer the previous direction or no arrow in the context of the new pinned style.
I removed the label for this case on purpose. I think it feels a little smoother, when we hide the label while clicking the button. Did you changed this n purpose?
The navigation dropdowns have a different text color, can you unify them?
What do you think about adding the z-index to the theme config as well?

commit.message: Increase height and add webkit prefix for CSS
More color tweaks, mainly for low res nav
